Description.Text:
Langfords Hotel is just off the vibrant Brighton and Hove seafront, a stone's throw from the beach, and 1.5 miles from Brighton's conference and exhibition centres. Langfords is a comfortable Hotel in which to relax, or to conduct your business.

There are many attractions nearby, including the magnificent Royal Pavilion, the historic Brighton Lanes, the West and Palace Piers, the Sea Life Centre, the Marina, the award-winning Churchill Square shopping centre, and the wonderful scenic countryside of the Sussex Downs. A wide range of leisure facilities are available locally - golf, sailing, sea fishing, jet-skiing, wind surfing, and many more.

All of our rooms are comfortable and spacious, because we want you to feel relaxed, at ease, and at home. If you have any special requirements, just let us know.All rooms are equipped with: en-suite bathroom, complimentary toiletries, colour TV, direct-dial telephone, ample working space, hospitality tray and complimentary stationery.

Driving:
Take the M23 and A23 southbound into Brighton,
following the road all the way to the seafront.
At the seafront, turn right towards Hove.
Follow the coast road for approx. 1 mile
(you will pass the West Pier on your left).
Turn right into Grand Avenue, then 1st left
into Church Road, then 1st left into Third Avenue.

STANDARD - GUEST_ROOM - Comfortable and spacious room with Single bed and ensuite facilities. Equipped with complimentary toiletries, colour TV, direct-dial telephone, ample working space, hospitality tray and complimentary stationery.
STANDARD - GUEST_ROOM - Comfortable and spacious room with 2 Single beds or 1 Double bed and ensuite facilities. Equipped with complimentary toiletries, colour TV, direct-dial telephone, ample working space, hospitality tray and complimentary stationery.
FAMILY - GUEST_ROOM - Comfortable and spacious room with 1 Double and 2 Single beds and ensuite facilities. Equipped with complimentary toiletries, colour TV, direct-dial telephone, ample working space, hospitality tray and complimentary stationery.
